text:
Anil Kumar
Microsoft Azure (Basic Management)

Delhi, Delhi - Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Anil-Kumar/96983a9dd7222ae5

and development area of IT development & management. Long term objective is to achieve
an
IT consultant position.

deterministic.

• Managing Network Racks, LAN & WAN.

• Maintenance and support of all type of desktops and Notebooks like HP, IBM, and HCL,
